content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-29.5, 30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -29.5, 30.5), boiler (position -34.5, 30.0), and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network, and the boiler has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Iron plate mine at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, -73.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, -73.0)

### Lab at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of a lab (position -10.5, 25.5), currently not powered.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when placing or connecting pipes too far away
- Ensure you are within the maximum distance of 10 tiles when attempting to place or connect pipes. Move closer to the target position before placing.

### Errors when placing pipes overlapping water
- Avoid placing pipes in positions that overlap with water. Check the target location before attempting to place a pipe.
